nightlight: "I have things to do"said the femme"and I need to be sure that=
 Elita will be ok, he wants us then I plan to find him before he comes... d=
ont ask me more; less you know, and elita will be safer "
 To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 09:46:56 -040=
0
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












Straig=
ht Shot falls off her seat with her mouth wide open.
" Yeah, what Talon sai=
d, what're ya saying?  Nightlight, things will be okay I'm sure they will."=


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 12:21 A=
M, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
     =
 
      
      



 Talom/Nightlight:
 
Nighlight looked at Talon and Strai=
ghtshot and Talon said "That's true... We belive that is that or something =
is controlling him... "
 
Nightlight said almost in low voice "If something=
 happens me, will you and Tucson care Elita?"
 
Talon looked surpriced at N=
ightlight and said "What are you saying?"
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: =
magicquartz@...
Date: Tue, 30 Aug 2011 22:53:48 -0400
Subject: Re: Le=
ssons to be Learned.










        












Straight Shot enters th=
e room with Talon and is careful not to wake Elita.  She smiles while looki=
ng to Nightlight and the cub.
" I can just see it now, all of us together, =
watching the young bots develop Their skills together..  Elita would really=
 love ta have someone ta pal around with.  I bet in the near future that wi=
ll happen.  And Nightlight, don't worry, Ticson is out there looking for Wh=
eelie and I bet he'll find Rodimus too.  I got ta thinking about things and=
 I realized that the shell program was long since gone a while ago.   I bet=
 that Dark Rodimus is a copy of the real Rodimus.  And if they're out there=
, Tucson will find them.  Isn't that right, Talon?"

Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy. 
On Aug 30, 2011, at 8:18 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <a=
irly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Nightl=
ight/Elita:
 
Talon smiled and glenty hit the door and feminine voice said =
"Come in"
 
Nightlight was sat down in one bed when Talon came in, and elit=
a was deeply sleep. 
 
Talon came in and sat down close to Nighlight whose =
was looking at the floor.
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@ya=
hoo.com
Date: Tue, 30 Aug 2011 08:29:31 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Le=
arned.










        












Straight Shot transforms into her rob=
ot mode and follows Talon to Nightlight's quarters.  She was happy to know =
that her suggestion was actually considered by Leo Prime, about getting the=
 femme bots together as a team.
" I really didn't think Leo would go for my=
 idea of letting the femme bots work as a team.  He sure surprised me."

Pe=
rpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 30, 2011, at 12:46 AM, A=
irshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
  =
    
      



Talon:
 
"Let's go then "saind the female while she walked t=
owards Nighlgiht's quaters  
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@=
yahoo.com
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 23:53:26 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be =
Learned.










        












Straight Shot nods. 
" Sure.  Let's=
 go.  She'll be happy ta know that Master Nightshift is accepting her and E=
lita as his students."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Au=
g 29, 2011, at 11:38 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:=







 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
Looking at straight shot =
"Do you want to come with me and pay a visit at Nightlight?"

ahoogroups.com

-0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.

ghtshift nods as he gets Talon's transmission.
" No problem, I'm flexible."=

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      =

      
      



Talon:
 
"I think that Elita is too young to train outsid=
e the ark"said Talon
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@yahoo.c=
om
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 19:24:03 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned=
.










        












Nightshift thinks for a moment. If anythin=
g, Tucson would rely on ground tracking to find Wheelie.  
" Most likely hi=
s field track'n tactics.  That means he's gonna land at the area and attemp=
t ta follow Wheelie on foot.  He knows how ta identify a bot just by foot a=
nd tire tracks alone. One more thing, he's got sharp senses and he was prom=
ised he'd be able ta go it alone.  Get downwind of him and he won't be too =
happy.  Even I know better then ta mess with him."


Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 6:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <superc=
yclonus@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      > <OLD>

>

>=
 Nightshift nods to Leo's request.

>

> " School will have ta open a littl=
e later than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on

> it."

>

> He transforms into S=
UV mode and rolls off toward Polar Claw.

>

> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna ma=
ke sure Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets wind

> that you didn't let em do t=
hat mission on his own, he's gonna see that as an

> act of distrust.  Then=
 he's really gonna be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I

> know.  Ratchet was the=
 same way.  Like dad like son."



<NEW>



"I know." LEO PRIME said over t=
he radio "But sometimes things are far

more important than his anger."



=
When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was already

standing w=
ith RAMULUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, they were

all in robot =
mode standing at the shuttle.



WOLFGANG was standing off to the side mani=
pulating something. "Its

fueled up and ready to go." WLFGANG said as he st=
owed an energon

dispensing unit in its holster.



"Good!" POLAR CLAW said=
. he was easily the largest of the group. While

not as tall as RODIMUS or =
TUSCON were, he was still broad and massive,

giving he appearance of great=
 size and ferocity.



POLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're her=
e because you know

Tuscon better than we." There was a dismissive grunt as=
 he glanced at

a PADD he had in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mi=
ssion

parameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.



"He's gone out alone. Sens=
ors showed that he was going off in the

direction of that jungle where Rod=
imus is suppose to be." There was

another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same=
 direction Wheelie took as

well."



POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he loo=
ked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we

have of that place shows it is a dense j=
ungle, his inhanced senses

will not help him much there. What tactic do yo=
u think he will use to

locate Wheelie?"



(TAG)



Preston
